name: Dear Tomoyo (Meiling x Tomoyo)
description:
This comic is dedicated to every little queer girl who grew up watching CardCaptor Sakura and desperately wished that Tomoyo could fall for someone who would love her back.  💖

Not just a love letter to one of the most iconic sapphic anime girls of the early aughts, but to the disctinctive art style of CardCaptor Sakura manga, which I did my best to channel in this zine!
